name: "A little writing a day" pencils
description: A dozen of our lovely pencils in a slipcase. Unsharpened with eraser end and 2B lead. Could be a gift to that special someone or yourself! *Pencils are not perfectly white and some of the text might not be perfectly aligned owing to the manufacturing process. Price is in SGD (Singapore Dollars). All orders will be posted via regular mail in a bubble envelope. Please allow up to 3 weeks for international delivery. For more images, please visit our website.

name: 2011 ~dreams & wishes~
description: Pepper & Cinnamon's calendar illustrates the theme of ~dreams & wishes~ for the year 2011. Can be hung using clips, hangers or even frames! Printed on acid-free uncoated 120gsm A3 stock using water-resistant inkjet technology. Price is in SGD (Singapore Dollars). All orders will be posted via registered mail in a cardboard tube. Please allow up to 2 weeks for international delivery. For more images, please visit here.
